scripts.webpack: webpack clickInterceptor.js dist/click-interceptor.js --output-library ClickInterceptor --output-library-target var && cp router.js dist/mini-router.core.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs -c -m -o dist/click-interceptor.min.js dist/click-interceptor.js && uglifyjs -c -m -o dist/mini-router.core.min.js dist/mini-router.core.js
scripts.complete: uglifyjs -b -o dist/mini-router.js dist/click-interceptor.js dist/mini-router.core.js && uglifyjs -o dist/mini-router.min.js dist/mini-router.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run webpack && npm run uglify && npm run complete
